箰字的基本解释

箰
sǔn
古同“筍”。

箰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǔn］
［《廣韻》思尹切，上準，心。］
同“筍1”。
竹类的嫩茎、芽。

箰字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　箰； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页890第13
【廣韻】思引切【集韻】聳尹切【正韻】聳允切，?音筍。【集韻】竹胎也。【筍譜】筍或作箰。【莊子·至樂篇】羊奚比乎不箰久竹生靑寧。【註】司馬云：羊奚，草名。根似蕪菁，與不箰之久竹比合而生靑寧。靑寧，竹根蟲也。　又【玉篇】箰箻，以捕鳥也。

箰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
箰字的起名意思

暂无。

sǔn

[①] [sǔn]
["Guangyun" Si Yinqie, quasi, heart. ]
Same as "Bamboo 1".
The tender stems and buds of bamboo.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　箰; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 890 13
[Guang Yun] Thinking of Yin Cut [Ji Yun] Shing Yin Cut [Zheng Yun] Shing Yun cut, sound bamboo shoots. [Jiyun] Bamboo fetus too. [Bamboo spectrum] bamboo shoots or bamboo baskets. [Zhuangzi·Zhi Le Chapter] Yang Xi is more than a long time, and the bamboo gives birth to Qianning. [Note] Sima Yun: Yang Xi, grass name. The roots are like turnips, and they are combined with the long bamboo to give birth to Tanning. Qianning, bamboo root insects are also.　[Jade articles] Shouji, to catch birds.
